title: What Chauvin’s Guilty Verdict Says About Us
sub_head: A sobering lesson to liberals and Europhiles? Or is that an overreach?
body:
Regarding your editorial “The Chauvin Verdict” (April 21): I am among the “many Americans” who are “relieved that justice was done for [George] Floyd.” I hope Derek Chauvin stays “behind bars for more than a decade.” Yet in this case I haven’t seen liberal fans of restorative justice calling for it as a supplement, let alone as an alternative, to punishment.
When is punishment deplored?
Well, whose ox is being gored?
Prof. Felicia Nimue Ackerman
Brown University
